name: Paimon
desc: The Traveler's best friend and Teyvat guide.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2020</color>
Birthdays are delicious! ...Oh, wait, Paimon means...
With so many desserts to eat, birthdays are just the best!
Thanks to 阿托伊玛 for the fantastic artwork!

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2021</color>
Today is Paimon's birthday!
Traveler, come! Paimon got tons of delicious snacks today. Let's enjoy this feast together!
It turns out that on birthdays, all your wishes do come true!
So... Paimon can't wait for your birthday, Traveler! Heehee...

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2021</color>
Today is Paimon's birthday ><
Thank you for being such a great partner on this journey, Travelers! Paimon's biggest wish is that we can always be together on this adventure!

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2022</color>
"Paimon's got your gift! Thank you, Traveler! In the days to come, Paimon will continue to be your best travel guide!"

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2022</color>
Wow, there's so many Slime Balloons! Did you do this all by yourself?
No wonder you were being so quiet and yesterday, avoiding Paimon. It was to prepare all this.
Thank you! For this year, Paimon's birthday wish is to always be at your side!
Eh? You're saying that was Paimon's wish last year, and the year before that?
Hmph! What's wrong with that? You think Paimon's that indecisive?

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2023</color>
Lalala~♪ La♪ Lala~♪ Hehe, how's Paimon's singing?
Thank you for coming to Paimon's dreams just to celebrate Paimon's birthday! Paimon is super happy!
*rumble grumble* Ah, can people get hungry in their dreams? Then no more sleeping, if Paimon sleeps in too much, she'll miss the scrumptious meal the Traveler has prepared!
See you soon! Let's celebrate and eat something delicious together! Don't miss it!

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2023</color>
"Um, Traveler? Why are you hiding your hands behind your back...?"
"Hehe, now Paimon gets it! You've got a present for Paimon, don't you?"

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2024</color>
"Wow, th—thank you! Paimon couldn't possibly... Is it all for Paimon? Ehehe..."

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2024</color>
Ahem. Traveler, you have presents for Paimon today, don't you?
Aww, these are the presents you prepared already? Paimon knew you wouldn't forget about her birthday! Hee-hee.
Whoa, s—so many desserts! *chomp* *munch* These are all Paimon's favorites! They must have cost you a fortune, so Paimon will make sure every Mora was well spent by finishing them all!
Ahh, if only Paimon could have 10 birthdays each year... No, no, make it 100! And Paimon would spend every single one of them with you for sure!
Thanks to 鉢人 for the fantastic artwork!

<color=#ffd780>June 1, 2025</color>
Whoa, everyone from Natlan is here already...
Oh wow, Saurus Crackers! Paimon can tell you made these yourself, they look just like teeny-tiny baby saurians~
Ehehe~ Thanks for preparing a birthday surprise for Paimon!
Ooohh, Paimon's gonna dig in! Come here, everyone! Paimon's gonna share these goodies with all her saurian friends~
